item.title: People in Japan, Hawaii and some parts of the US west coast have been told to evacuate after an 8.8 magnitude earthquake hit Russia's eastern Kamchatka Peninsula. #Earthquake #Russia #KamchatkaPeninsula #Hokkaido #Japan #Hawaii #Evacuation #WarningSiren #
item.description: People in Japan, Hawaii and some parts of the US west coast have been told to evacuate after an 8.8 magnitude earthquake hit Russia's eastern Kamchatka Peninsula. #Earthquake #Russia #KamchatkaPeninsula #Hokkaido #Japan #Hawaii #Evacuation #WarningSiren #

item.title: In Japan, 1.9 million people have been told to evacuate and a tsunami wave of 4.3ft (1.3m) has reached the northern Iwate prefecture, according to the country's weather agency. #Earthquake #Russia #KamchatkaPeninsula #Hokkaido #Ibaraki #Japan #Evacuation
item.description: In Japan, 1.9 million people have been told to evacuate and a tsunami wave of 4.3ft (1.3m) has reached the northern Iwate prefecture, according to the country's weather agency. #Earthquake #Russia #KamchatkaPeninsula #Hokkaido #Ibaraki #Japan #Evacuation

item.title: People in Hawaii were told to evacuate after an 8.8 magnitude earthquake hit Russia's eastern Kamchatka Peninsula. The tsunami warning has now been downgraded to an advisory level. #Earthquake #Russia #KamchatkaPeninsula #Hawaii #Evacuation #EmergencyAler
item.description: People in Hawaii were told to evacuate after an 8.8 magnitude earthquake hit Russia's eastern Kamchatka Peninsula. The tsunami warning has now been downgraded to an advisory level. #Earthquake #Russia #KamchatkaPeninsula #Hawaii #Evacuation #EmergencyAler
